name: Talim
title: The Wind Dancer
subtitle: A graceful warrior who harnesses the power of wind to dance through battle
lore: A young priestess who has mastered the art of wind manipulation, Talim combines her spiritual connection to the winds with deadly blade techniques. Her agility and control over air currents allow her to move swiftly across the battlefield while dealing devastating damage to her enemies. Despite her youth, her dedication to protecting the balance of nature makes her a formidable fighter.

passive.name: Windsurfer
passive.description: Every third autoattack to the same target gives Talim 1 autoattack reduction which can stack up to [3] for [3 seconds]. It also gives Talim [60/70/75/80/100/120] MS.

Q.name: Blowing Up
Q.description: Talim summons a small wind in front of her in the target direction, which knocks up the first enemy hit and deals [50/90/160/225/400] magical damage for [0.4] second. Upon cast, Talim also dashes in the target direction.

W.name: Windride
W.description: Talim jumps in a close target direction OR she can jump over any wall. Each autoattack reduces the cooldown of this ability by [0.5] second.

E.name: Spinning Blades
E.description: Talim spins dealing [100/135/290/430/550] physical damage with her blades to all targets hit. She also reduces the targets' armor by [10%] for [2.5] seconds. Each autoattack reduces the cooldown of this ability by 0.5s

R.name: Tornado Blow
R.description: Talim summons a vertical tornado to the targeted direction, which deals [665/900/1420/1755] magical damage. Talim gains [+35] AD for each enemy hit. Takedowns reduce the cooldown of this ability by [50] seconds.

1.name: Swift Wind
1.description: Talim gains [+30] MS out of combat, which increases to [+55] after lvl 15

1.name: Wind Shield
1.description: QUEST: Get [5] kill participations before [10] minutes: Item: Talim becomes invulnerable for [2] sec (30s cd)

5.name: Wind Reset
5.description: Item: Talim's basic abilities reset to 0. (80 seconds cooldown)

5.name: Wind's Fury
5.description: Item: Upon activation, Talim deals [15%] more damage for [5] seconds (80 seconds cooldown)

5.name: Wind Walker
5.description: Talim can't be slowed during the game

10.name: Armor Breaker
10.description: Tornado Blow reduces the enemies' armor by 5% for [5] seconds.

10.name: Tempest
10.description: Tornado Blow slows enemies by [25%] for [2] seconds.

15.name: Enhanced Wind
15.description: Blowing Up deals an additional [80/150/250] magical damage

15.name: Last Stand
15.description: If Talim is the only one alive in the team, she deals [240%] damage (not working in 1v1 mode)

20.name: Wind's Protection
20.description: Talim takes 15% less damage from all sources

20.name: Swift Strikes
20.description: All your abilities lose [5] seconds cd

20.name: Wind's Renewal
20.description: Killing an enemy restores 35% of your maximum health
